scripts.all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "compile-api,compile-countries,api,countriesApi,emailSender" -c "red,red,yellow,yellow,blue,blue"  "npm run compile-api" "npm run compile-countries" "npm run run-api" "npm run run-countries-api" "npm run run-es-1"
scripts.compile-api: cd .. && cd api && npm run build-watch
scripts.compile-countries: cd .. && cd countriesApi && npm run build-watch
scripts.run-api: cd .. && cd api && npm run start-dev
scripts.run-countries-api: cd .. && cd countriesApi && npm run start-dev
